name: Smart Watch
description: ZPPSNFIT Smart Watch, 1.43’’ AMOLED Smart Watches for Men Women (Answer/Make Call), Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate/Sleep Monitor, IP68 Waterproof Activity Tracker, Pedometer for Android iOS
details: Bluetooth Call: Smart watch is equipped with built-in hd speaker, after connecting to your smartphone via bluetooth, you can answer or make calls, view call history and store contacts through directly use the smartwatch.

Message Notification: The smart watch also provides notifications of social media messages including facebook, whatsApp, instagram, twitter, etc. through vibrating alerts. So that you will never miss any important information.

Unique Touch Screen: The AMOLED smart watch is equipped with 466x466 ultra-large HD full-touch color screen with outstanding high resolution and high touch sensitivity, which can bring you a unique visual effect and better interactive experience.

24-Hour Health Monitoring: Smart watch adopting advanced sensors, accurately monitors and records your healthy data such as heart rate and sleeping. It will provide comprehensive sleep quality analysis.
Colorful Dial: With the connecting “H Band” app, you can download personalized dials for free or choose your own favorite photo to switch dials and set it as your fitness tracker desktop.

150+ Sports Modes and IP68 Waterproof: The AMOLED smartwatch supports multiple sports modes, including running, cycling, walking, football etc. and record your data. The waterproof smartwatch can be used in many activities.

Multifunctional and Long Battery Life: Smart watch has multiple functions such as find your phone, sedentary reminder, music control etc. The sport tracker with 5-7 days of normal use and about 30 days of standby time.

Connection App and Note: Synchronize to the mobile phone app H Band, you can understand your health status by fitness tracker watch to adapt a healthier lifestyle. The watch is not recommended to take shower and swimming.
